channel.title: Weird Runserver Error
channel.description:
Ok after I edited prices in item.cfg I got a weird error when starting the Runserver.bat. I never seen anything like it.
[code]RuneOholics V1.337 Starting... Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: " 2" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:313) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:29) [/code]
Seems like the problem is in the ItemHandler but I can't find any problems in there.
[b]EDIT:[/b] Problem solved, replaced the old item.cfg with a backup one. It was the item.cfg, I must have done something odd in it :P

item.title: Weird Runserver Error
item.dc:creator: @huggies huggies
item.description:

Seems like the problem is in the ItemHandler but I canâ€™t find any problems in there.
